snippet.title: King Tongue – It’s going to be a true Banana Split!
snippet.description:
King Tongue, the pure arcade  action game arrives on your smartphones and tablets !

The BANANA Kingdom has declared war on the Apes: Super-armed Bananas arrive by the thousands to defeat monkeys. BUT THE TIME FOR REVENGE HAS COME!


In November, download King Tongue on the App Store.

More information :
http://www.king-tongue.com/en
http://www.king-tongue.com/en/kingstarter
